dev.aherscu.qa.jgiven.commons.utils

Class HikariPoolingDataSourceFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.aherscu.qa.jgiven.commons.utils.AbstractConfigurableDataSourceFactory
      • dev.aherscu.qa.jgiven.commons.utils.HikariPoolingDataSourceFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.unitils.core.util.Configurable, org.unitils.database.config.DataSourceFactory

    public class HikariPoolingDataSourceFactory
extends AbstractConfigurableDataSourceFactory
    Implementation of DataSourceFactory to replace the default connection pooling used by Unitils' DatabaseModule.

    This implementation uses HikariCP as its connection pooling library.

    Adapted from PropertiesDataSourceFactory.

    Author:
    aherscu

      • connectionTimeout

        protected long connectionTimeout()
        Override to customize the connection timeout.
        Returns:
        the configured connection timeout; by default 30,000 ms
        See Also:
        HikariConfig.setConnectionTimeout(long)

      • idleTimeout

        protected long idleTimeout()
        Override to customize the idle timeout.
        Returns:
        the configured idle timeout; by default 600,000 ms (10 minutes)
        See Also:
        HikariConfig.setIdleTimeout(long)

      • maxLifetime

        protected long maxLifetime()
        Override to customize the maximum life time of connection in the pool.
        Returns:
        the configured maximum life time; defaults to 1,800,000 ms (30 minutes)
        See Also:
        HikariConfig.setMaxLifetime(long)

      • maximumPoolSize

        protected int maximumPoolSize()
        Override to customize the maximum pool size.
        Returns:
        the configured maximum pool size; defaults to 10 connections
        See Also:
        HikariConfig.setMaximumPoolSize(int)
